title: Feature Engineering
content:
Module 3, Lesson 7: Feature Engineering

The Hook

Feature engineering — creating and transforming input variables — is often the highest-leverage skill in applied data science. Well-engineered features can make a simple model beat a complex one.

The Concept

1. Feature creation (interaction, ratio, date-time features)

Understanding Feature creation (interaction, ratio, date-time features) is foundational to this topic. Indian companies and research institutions apply these principles in production AI systems every day.

2. Text feature engineering (TF-IDF, word embeddings)

Text feature engineering (TF-IDF, word embeddings) forms the core methodology for practitioners. India's tech ecosystem from Bengaluru to Hyderabad deploys these approaches at scale.

3. Target encoding and frequency encoding

Target encoding and frequency encoding is critical for building reliable AI solutions. Top Indian firms like TCS, Wipro, Infosys, and startups like Razorpay all leverage these techniques.

4. Feature selection (filter, wrapper, embedded methods)

Mastering Feature selection (filter, wrapper, embedded methods) separates good practitioners from great ones. Apply these concepts on Indian open datasets from data.gov.in to build hands-on expertise.

The Illustration

This lesson covered Feature creation (interaction, ratio, date-time features), Text feature engineering (TF-IDF, word embeddings), Target encoding and frequency encoding, and Feature selection (filter, wrapper, embedded methods). These are the building blocks of feature engineering — master them through practice on real Indian datasets.

quiz.question: What is feature engineering?
options: Creating informative input variables from raw data for ML models

quiz.question: What is the risk of target encoding?
options: Data leakage if not done with cross-validation

quiz.question: Which feature is most useful for Indian e-commerce demand forecasting?
What does Lasso regularisation do for feature selection?
options: Shrinks irrelevant feature coefficients to zero
